name: lover boy mania!

Lover Boy Mania! is a psychological horror-themed visual novel with simulation elements.

Help your boyfriend Nico navigate his life on the internet---and his life with you. 

Disclaimer: Game contains heavy topics such as suicide and self-harm. Player discretion is advised.
